lead_paragraph: A warm-up for next year’s America’s Cup will be held in the city in May, the first time part of the America’s Cup will be in the city since 1920.

headline.print_headline: New York City to Host Regatta
headline.main: New York City to Host Regatta

snippet: A warm-up for next year’s America’s Cup will be held in the city in May, the first time part of the America’s Cup will be in the city since 1920.
abstract: New York City will host warm-up regatta for 2017 America's Cup, first time city has had part in race since 1920.
